title: Android 13 DP2: Taskbar for tablets & big screens gets its own app drawer
content:
Android 12L renewed Google’s focus on big screen devices, seemingly just in time, and Android 13 is only expanding on that. In the latest Android 13 preview, we’re seeing a new app drawer on the taskbar.

more…

The post Android 13 DP2: Taskbar for tablets & big screens gets its own app drawer appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has updated the tablet-focused taskbar in Android 13 to include an app drawer for easy access to all of your apps.
